title: 820-00163 restarting on charge power only
message:
Hi, got an 820-00163 that restarts on 10% apple loading screen when connected only to charger. If i connect both the battery and charger or even only the battery alone it boots fine.

Tried different 85w chaerges, different DC IN board, different SSDs but nothing

title: 820-00163 restarting on charge power only
message:
Test starting in SMC bypass mode.
You may have GPU issue, or FDMF6808N problem.
